title: Sion skin Brainstorm - incorporating old with new: Special Forces Sion
body:
I've written before about getting Sion getting his Traditional skin as with many others but to no avail. It made me think how could we incorporate the old Sion with the new? It would be so great if the Arnie voice came back and I hope others would agree, so here is my suggestion for incorporating old with new: 

**Special Forces Sion**

People can help me out here this is just a rough brainstorm but I hope the jist of it is relayed.

- Sion to be kitted in Military Apparel holding a military combat Axe, maybe even a Shotgun Axe to fire his E add sunglasses of course

-Add some great lines from Arnie's Predator/Commando/Terminator movies into his kit.

 - The Creme de la Creme would be Sion's ultimate; he jumps into a Hind (Russian Attack helicopter) or swings from it and for sure he should be yelling "Get to the Choppa!!! or "ANG-ANG-ANG-ANG-ANG!" (Die hard fans should get that...I hope...)

I hope Riot thinks this is interesting enough to consider and if Sion die hard fans also agree or disagree with this skin/idea.

Cheers
